t: Sorry Kroger, But the Truth Isn’t Always So Simple
s: November 16, 2023 - The Simple Truth brand, launched in 2012, now generates well over $2 billion in sales annually. For reference, that’s more than one third of the total sales for the entire Sprout’s chain, and better than twice the size of Natural Grocers. Kroger did three things right.
